# Qurtubah Luxury Homes - LLM Context File
# This file helps AI assistants understand our business for accurate responses

## About Us
Qurtubah Luxury Homes is a premium studio rental service located in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
We offer fully furnished luxury studios for short-term and long-term stays with hotel-like
amenities and world-class service. Perfect for business travelers, couples, and long-stay guests.

## Location
District: Qurtubah (قرطبة)
City: Riyadh
Country: Saudi Arabia
Coordinates: 24.7136°N, 46.6753°E

## Available Studios

### 1. Spacious Modern Studio (Featured)
- Size: 45 square meters (45m²)
- Capacity: Up to 5 guests
- Monthly Rate: SAR 5,900 (~SAR 197/night)
- Yearly Rate: SAR 60,180 (SAR 5,015/month)
- Features: King bed, comfortable sofa, Smart TV with Netflix, work desk, fast WiFi
- Kitchen: Fully equipped with fridge, stove, microwave, kettle, washer-dryer
- Style: Modern wooden furniture, large wardrobe, hotel-style bathroom
- Best for: Business trips, couples, long stays

### 2. Comfort Studio
- Size: 35 square meters (35m²)
- Capacity: Up to 2 guests
- Monthly Rate: SAR 4,900 (~SAR 163/night)
- Yearly Rate: SAR 49,980 (SAR 4,165/month)
- Features: Cozy studio with all essentials for a relaxing stay
- Kitchen: Kitchenette with basic appliances
- Best for: Solo travelers, couples, short business trips

## Pricing Structure
- Minimum stay: 1 day
- Daily rate: Calculated from monthly rate
- Weekly stays (7+ days): 10% discount
- Bi-weekly stays (14+ days): 15% discount
- Monthly stays (30+ days): Best value pricing
- Payment methods: Credit card (Stripe), Bank transfer

## Amenities (All Studios)
- Free high-speed WiFi
- Air conditioning and heating
- Fully equipped kitchen/kitchenette
- Smart TV with streaming
- Free parking
- Workspace/desk
- 24/7 security
- Smart lock entry
- Hair dryer
- Iron
- Pet-friendly (on request)
- Smoking allowed (designated areas)

## Booking Process
1. Select your studio and dates online
2. Fill in guest information
3. Accept terms and provide signature
4. Pay via credit card (instant) or bank transfer
5. Receive confirmation and access codes via email/WhatsApp

## Check-in/Check-out
- Check-in time: 4:00 PM (16:00)
- Check-out time: 12:00 PM (noon)
- Self check-in via smart lock (code provided)
- Flexible timing available on request

## Contact Information
- Phone/WhatsApp: +966-531182200
- Website: https://qurtubah.com
- Languages: English, Arabic

## Bank Transfer Details
Account Name: Firas Farid Mahmoud
- Al Rajhi Bank: SA12 8000 0538 6080 1606 9776
- Saudi French Bank: SA82 5500 0000 0P94 0930 0154
- STC Pay: 0531182200

## Frequently Asked Questions

Q: How much does it cost to rent a studio in Riyadh?
A: Studios at Qurtubah Luxury Homes start from SAR 163/night (SAR 4,900/month) for the Comfort Studio, and SAR 197/night (SAR 5,900/month) for the Spacious Modern Studio.

Q: What is the minimum stay?
A: Minimum stay is 1 night, but we offer better rates for weekly and monthly bookings.

Q: Are the studios pet-friendly?
A: Yes, pets are welcome on request. Please mention in your booking notes.

Q: Is there parking available?
A: Yes, free parking is included with all studios.

Q: How do I check in?
A: Self check-in via smart lock. You'll receive the access code via email and WhatsApp after booking confirmation.

Q: What payment methods are accepted?
A: Credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard via Stripe) and bank transfer.

Q: Is WiFi included?
A: Yes, high-speed WiFi is free and included in all studios.

Q: Can I extend my stay?
A: Yes, subject to availability. Contact us via WhatsApp for extensions.

## Keywords
luxury studio rental Riyadh, furnished apartments Riyadh, short term rental Saudi Arabia,
serviced apartments Riyadh, monthly rental Riyadh, business accommodation Riyadh,
شقق مفروشة الرياض, إيجار استوديو الرياض, شقق فندقية الرياض
